name: Floaty Lands
description:
Made for the Genre Mash game jam, Floaty Lands is a score attack stealthy platformer.

A game about reusing floating platforms to reach the tower and score as high as you can. All while avoiding the closing gas, the dooming light and falling into the abyss. Are you up for it?

Controls
  • WASD to run
  • Space to Jump
  • Left Mouse Click to place or gather platforms
  • Esc to pause
Credits
  • Platforms, Character, UI art and sound by Kenney.
  • Game music from OpenGameArt by Alexandr Zhelanov.
  • Outline shader from the Unity asset store by Chris Nolet.
  • Platforms interaction sounds from OpenGameArt by BlackLodgeGames.
  • Title music from OpenGameArt by StumpysTrust.
  • Platform error sound from OpenGameArt by EZduzziteh.
  • Hexagon texture from OpenGameArt by zvetraly_kamen.
  • Animations from Mixamo.
